snippet: Coyotes have been showing up with increasing frequency in New York City itself, where until just a few years ago they were almost never seen.
abstract: Norwood, NJ, resident is attacked by coyote while walking his dog; incident is second coyote attack in Bergen County this April.
lead_paragraph: Coyotes have been showing up with increasing frequency in New York City itself, where until just a few years ago they were almost never seen.

headline.main: 2nd Person Is Attacked by a Coyote in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: 2nd Person Is Attacked by a Coyote in New Jersey
